amendment.description: To provide for the reopening of the Cape Arundel Disposal Site as a dredged material disposal site.

vote.text: Amendment SA 898 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 898 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 898 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 898 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Collins.
